channel.title: Dessa on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in Dessa on Paul Cutler

item.title: I love Minnesota Music
item.description: As a transplant to Minnesota from Wisconsin, I’ve now spent over half my life here. I’m a cheesehead through and through, but if there is one thing that Minnesota has that Wisconsin has never had, it’s the music. The first album I ever bought was Prince’s Purple Rain and my first ever trip to Minnesota I actually met Prince, which is another story for a different time. A few years later I was living here and I won tickets on Rev105 to a local music showcase at First Avenue.

item.title: Favorite Albums of 2013
item.description: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/silwenae/11061236153/in/set-72157638067918784/player/] With 2013 now in the books, I’d like to share some of my favorite albums of 2013. After Polica dropped their debut album digitally on December 20th, 2011, I’ve learned to wait until the year is over to share my favorite albums – don’t want to miss one! These might not be the critic’s choices, but these are albums I like, and almost all of them I’ve bought on vinyl this year.
